snippet: Christodoulos Xiros, a member of the terrorist group November 17, is at large after failing to check in with the police, fueling fears of a resurgence in political violence.
lead_paragraph: Christodoulos Xiros, a member of the terrorist group November 17, is at large after failing to check in with the police, fueling fears of a resurgence in political violence.

headline.main: Greek Police Hunt for Convicted Terrorist Who Disappeared on Furlough
headline.print_headline: Greek Police Hunt for Convicted Terrorist Who Disappeared on Furlough
